attributes.action: Lobby FIFA, and UEFA allies for World Cup 2018 to be move away from Russia
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned believe that while Russia is behaving as a rogue state, disrespecting human rights, whipping up conflict with its neighbours, and threatening global security, it is not a fit nation to be hosting the 2018 World Cup, or any major event. If we in the west are serious about sanctions, and not merely words, we should take this opportunity to hit them very hard in the pocket.
